context.p: The generated report gives a brief summary of the time spent on various activities for a given period of time. With multiple download format options, it is very convenient to analyze if the available time is spent on the right activities.

step.cmd: In the left pane, select the Reports option.
On the top right corner, click on the downward arrow icon.
Three options are displayed:Download PDF, Download CSV, Download excel.
The PDF file will be downloaded on your computer.

b.i: These basic elements are only the beginning of your exploration journey with Toggl Track……..
